Class Properties

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Holds all the default properties.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public static java.lang.String getName()
        Reads the name from the file vApus-agent.properties (must be in the default package). The file must contain an entry like this: name=foo
        Returns:
        name

      • getVersion

        public static java.lang.String getVersion()
        Reads the version from the file vApus-agent.properties (must be in the default package). The file must contain an entry like this: version=0.1
        Returns:
        version

      • getCopyright

        public static java.lang.String getCopyright()
        Reads the copyright notice from the file vApus-agent.properties (must be in the default package). The file must contain an entry like this: copyright=Copyright 2014 (c) Sizing Servers Lab\nUniversity College of West-Flanders, Department GKG
        Returns:
        copyright notice

      • getHelp

        public static java.lang.String getHelp()
        Constructed using name and defaultPort.
        Returns:
        help

      • getDefaultPort

        public static int getDefaultPort()
        Reads the default port from the file vApus-agent.properties (must be in the default package). The file must contain an entry like this: defaultPort=1234
        Returns:
        default port

      • getSendCountersInterval

        public static int getSendCountersInterval()
        Reads the send counters interval in milliseconds from the file vApus-agent.properties (must be in the default package). The file must contain an entry like this: sendCountersInterval=1000
        Returns:
        send counters interval

      • getDecimalSeparator

        public static java.lang.String getDecimalSeparator()
        Reads the decimal separator from the file vApus-agent.properties (must be in the default package). The file must contain an entry like this: decimalSeparator=.
        Returns:
        decimal separator
